goals__remit: Swissport International Ltd. provides ground services for more than 250 million passengers and handles 4.3 million tonnes of cargo a year on behalf of some 845 client-companies in the aviation sector. With a workforce of more than 65,000 personnel, Swissport is active at more than 279 stations in 48 countries across five continents, and generates consolidated operating revenue of EUR 2.7 billion.
